reviews.review:
Jugar survivor estando solo en este juego es tan divertido como meterse un tiro en la rodilla.

Jugar Killer casi siempre se siente como si te pusieran una bola de vidrios rotos en la boca, viniera un caballo, te pusiera el culo entre los labios y te la bajara por la garganta de un pedo. 

Una pena, desde el nuevo mmr siento que el juego ya no es disfrutable en absoluto.

TLDR; Jueguen VHS, ta re piola

满分10 , 10/10 , 平衡很烂的 , 走地坐牢的 , 嘲讽很多的 , 不管四黑的 , 活动很棒的 .

建议 : 贞子待机动画改一改 , 我害怕 .

Играбельно только за покупных маньяков. Бесплатных маньяков понерфили до такой степени что от лива получишь больше наслаждения чем за игру на нем. Также прикольный подбор игроков по рангам и система набирания ранга, когда ты все что можно сделал, а с тебя чуть каплю не сняли, зато у китайца сидящего всю игру в шкафу второй ранг.
黎明杀机还是很好玩的，就是容易树上遛屠夫，草里找蘑菇，电机叮叮咚，屠夫贴脸哭。

On the surface DBD is fairly simple.  4 fragile Survivors have to repair 5 generators and play hide and seek against 1 overpowered Killer.  Survivors are in 3rd person, Killer in 1st.  
In between that objective there's a myriad of mechanics and details that can be exploited and used to your advantage on either team.  
Perks give you minor speed bonuses or boosts to repair speed while injured, and others provide locations of Killer totems throughout the map and give you speed/repair/heal bonuses based on how many are active and how many are destroyed and also give you clues on the Killer's whereabouts in the map and etc. etc.  
Consumable items earned through purchasing with Tokens (awarded after each game) can be maps, flashlights, keys, toolboxes, or medkits.  Each can have different consumable attachments that alter that item.  You could have a toolbox that sabotages Killer Hooks (which, if you are downed, you can be hung on and lose one Bar, and you can struggle to escape that Hook but it has a low chance to succeed so you might be better off waiting for a teammate to unhook you. If you wait too long you go into a separate state where you must continuously succeed a QTE to stay alive but only for a limited time)

At the very least it's also a cool concept for a game.  There's tons of original characters on top of crossovers with other major horror movie and game franchises.  If you ever wanted to play as Ash from Evil Dead with Bill from Left4Dead and Leon Kennedy from Resident Evil and Ashley from Silent Hill or the kid from Stranger Things against Leatherface from TTCM then you'll love this.  I've only made it to Survivor rank 12 as of writing this review so I'm probably not a super pro and haven't experienced any of the toxicity of higher rankings, so for now it's a tense game of cat and mouse that's kept me addicted for the past two months.  I'd recommend it on sale because the style and approach to the game isn't for everyone, and you may be put off it you aren't super willing to play seriously because there's no true unranked mode and people expect you to know what you're doing.

I loved this game at first. Amazing mechanics, cool perks, and cool visuals. But after a while of playing, you start to get into the dark side of this game. Mc. Donalds wifi users who kill you before you even notice what happened, killers who camp the living daylights out of you and provide no fun for others, and the competitive system is god awful. If you are interested in this game just know, this game does not have any long term replayability or fun unless your a 40 year old adult who still lives in their parents basement and hasn't seen the light of day or touched fucking GRASS.
